title: Ghost of Tsushima
summary: Ghost of Tsushima is a 2020 action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Featuring an open world, the player controls Jin Sakai, a samurai on a quest to protect Tsushima Island during the first Mongol invasion of Japan. The game was released for PlayStation 4 on July 17, 2020, and a Director's Cut for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 was released on August 20, 2021. It received several award nominations and wins, and was praised for its visuals, art direction, narrative, and combat but was criticized for its open world design. Ghost of Tsushima had sold 6.5 million copies by March 2021. A film adaptation is currently in development.
